txt.en: 'Three times have the Woodmen attempted to resettle Avabárg, and three times have we failed. Artifacts of the past lie there now, reminders of the misfortune and death that befell us within those walls. Do those reminders serve to draw the gloom toward Avabárg? Destroy them, and perhaps the darkness will abate. It is worth the attempt, [placeholder].'
Audvak believes that destroying sorrowful relics may help lift the darkness that has settled upon Avabárg.
Audvak of the Woodmen is concerned about the gloom that has descended upon Avabárg.
